title: Never Learn
lyrics:
What I’ve learned is
I should be staying on safe ground
What I do is
I stand too close to the edge all the time

I wanna make mistakes and lose myself to you

While I’m young

I know the risk I take will hurt but pain it matters

Somehow



I would be safer with my feet on the ground

I would be wiser without losing my mind



Oooooh but to live you gotta crash and burn

That’s ok cause I will never learn

I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh

I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh



What I’ve heard is

I should be playing it safe now

Nooooow



What I know is

I’d never be the one to back down

Noooo



I would be safer with my feet on the ground

I would be wiser without you by my side



Ooooh but to live you gotta crash and burn

That’s ok cause I will never learn

I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh

I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh



I would be safer with my feet on the ground

I would be wiser without you by my side



Ooooh but to live you gotta crash and burn

That’s ok cause I will never learn

I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh



I will never learn



Ooooh

Ooooh

Ooooh



I wanna make mistakes and lose myself to you

While I’m young
